content.query:
--Aggregation of sales by Time
CREATE VIEW vw_SalesByTime AS
SELECT 
    D.Year,
    D.Month,
    D.Quarter,
    D.WeekNumber,
    D.DayOfWeek,
    SUM(F.Quantity * F.UnitPrice) AS TotalRevenue
FROM GoldFact_Sales AS F
JOIN GoldDim_Date AS D
    ON F.DateID = D.DateID
    WHERE F.InvoiceNo NOT LIKE 'C%'
GROUP BY 
    D.Year, D.Month, D.Quarter, D.WeekNumber, D.DayOfWeek;
